project_descr: Strengthen the capacity of the Ministry of Legal Affairs and Constitutional Development (MOLACD) to ensure the respect for rule of law, due process and access to justice in Southern Sudan

donor_name: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
outputs.output_descr: The UNDP Rule of Law Institutional Support to MOLACD Project is a product of a highly participatory process premised within two mutually reinforcing UN development approaches; human-rights based approach and a results-based orientation. The adopted multi-year strategic approach recognizes and builds upon GOSS and other development partner interventions, as well as projection of future institutional demands and challenges. The Project will heed the goals of the CPAP in ensuring cross-linkages across projects and between programmes, innovation, quality assurance and enhancing sustainability of results
